law.text: The board of aldermen of a city of the first class may set apart or appropriate as a site for the buildings and grounds of its municipal university any public grounds of the city not specially appropriated or dedicated by ordinance to another use.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2948a-6.
